item.description:
We will be attending the 7:30PM show at AMC Lowes Boston Common. I will be waiting at the tables near the upstairs concession stand starting at 6:30PM and we'll head into the movie around 7PM.

If you don't see us before, we'll gather for a bit outside the theater after the movie is over and then head to dinner. 

Here's the Yahoo Movies description:

  In the wake of Abraham Lincoln's assassination, seven men and one woman are arrested and charged with conspiring to kill the President, Vice President, and Secretary of State. The lone woman charged, Mary Surratt, owns a boarding house where John Wilkes Booth, and others met and planned the simultaneous attacks.

Against the ominous back-drop of post-Civil War Washington, newly-minted lawyer, Frederick Aiken, a 28-year-old Union war-hero, reluctantly agrees to defend Surratt before a military tribunal. Aiken realizes his client may be innocent and that she is being used as bait and hostage in order to capture the only conspirator to have escaped a massive manhunt, her own son, John. As the nation turns against her, Surratt is forced to rely on Aiken to uncover the truth and save her life.
Genres: Drama and Biopic Release Date: April 15th, 2011 (limited) MPAA Rating: PG-13 for some violent content. Distributors: Roadside Attractions, The American Film Company

 

Per the group tradition, I'll pick a place for us to eat/drink and discuss the movie after the show and depending on interest. If you have any suggestions, feel free to post them in the comments, send me a message, or just come with your thoughts. Hope to see you there! :)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a Meetup sign and will be waiting by the tables in the upstairs lobby of the theater at least a half hour before the show. We'll also wait around for a little bit outside the theater after the movie is over.
item.why: Calling all history buffs and general movie fans! I've picked this as my first meetup to organize because I'm a history, movie, & James McAvoy fan among other things and hope you'll join me.
item.name: The Conspirator
